The Knight is trimmed, while the Kling was busted out of a PSA 4(MC) holder. Prices include shipping and insurance. Checks and money orders are fine. Sorry, no Paypal. Thanks for looking ...

Evers SOLD
Knight $30
Kling $75
Chris- that's a beautiful Kling, no clue why PSA only gave it a grade of 4, looks like a 6 to me....
